ygData.subject: RE: Chain and Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: Given, that it has been observed that songs gain power as you level past them.  Do you think that using Largo s Binding will work better than Chain on the
ygData.messageBody:
Given, that it has been observed that songs gain power as you level past
them. Do you think that using Largo's Binding will work better than Chain
on the stronger mobs u r fighting? Better for slowing their attack speed I
mean. Sometimes I have been using chain early on to get the slower atck
effect - but on them yeller and reds - I get loads of resists - or sometimes
no message at all? Plus - we all know that someone else should be snaring it
anywho. So think using the lower level song will be better chance of working
on the mobs?

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 1:54 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Chain and Binding

From: <kim@...>

There was some disagreement over whether the attack slowdown
from these two stacked so I timed them again. I picked a
mob
(a giant fire beetle) and let it beat on me while I timed
how
long it took for it to make 10 attacks.

Normal: 30.1 sec, 30.2 sec
Chain: 38.4 sec, 37.9sec
Binding: 38.2 sec, 38.2 sec
Chain + Binding: 37.8 sec, 38.2 sec

Slowdown is about 25%, and they most definitely do not
stack.
I'll test it with the enchanter's spells next time I meet
one
of my enchanter friends.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
